channel.title: Post your ideal RSC PK'ing stats
channel.description:
I was getting a lot of kills back then with a level 49: 40 10 72 but then I hated having 10 defense levels so I trained up a new account, a level 49: 40 1 76
The training wasn't too bad because I did it at the mourners before the quest was fixed.
I'd say level 49 around Varrock is the perfect level.
Oh and the ordering is A|D|S|HP. This was back when the game wasn't made for preteens and you had to click [b]a lot[/b].

item.title: Post your ideal RSC PK'ing stats
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Errorist:

Yeah, if you hit anything near 20 on people that was half of their HP.

exactly, dealing 26’s for fun.

Read full topic
